title: Sam Faiers wows in daring low-cut gown and new dark hair at Pride of Britain
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Sam Faiers wore a daring gown on the red carpet at the Pride of Britain Awards.

The mum-of-two gave the crowd a look at her tiny figure in the plunging black velvet dress, which was kept together with a cute bow.

She added a matching black choker to accessorise, as well as a sparkly clutch bag.

Her new dark locks were swept back into a sleek hairstyle, showcasing her sculpted jawline and glam make-up look.

Sam's tanned skin looked amazing following the many lavish holidays she's already been on this year.

The star earlier shared a cute snap of herself and husband Paul on their way to the glamorous awards ceremony.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

(Image: PA)

(Image: PA)

The pair were captured in a cab on the way to the event, holding hands in a loved-up snap.

Sam and Paul looked like the perfect couple in their smart outfits.
description: Reality star Sam Faiers stunned in a daring plunge gown at the Pride of Britain Awards
